Kenneth Petersen Boise State Universitycollege of business and economics dean speaks during a business dean candidate forum March  in the Business Building PERIOD Petersen is the third of five dean candidates to come before an audience PERIOD

Dean candidate Kenneth Petersen spoke about focusing the College of Business around the core value proposition student learning student progress and student success PERIOD

Petersen dean of Boise State Universitys College of Business and Economics spoke in an open forum Tuesday PERIOD He was the third of five candidates to campaign to the college PERIOD

He highlighted the challenges higher education institutions face including cost the reduced value of the degree inefficient use of space and abuses of the tenure system PERIOD

He said focusing on students should be the colleges top priority when evaluating solutions to problems within the college and its curriculum PERIOD

You want to make sure youre attracting the right students and the right numbers so they can be successful he said PERIOD

Petersen also touched on the need for improved curriculum PERIOD He suggested using data and analytics to look at the trends in classes and evaluate how they can be improved PERIOD

Your curriculum at all levels has to flow he said PERIOD

During the QA portion of the forum accounting associate professor Ramgopal Venkataraman asked Petersen what programs he would implement if chosen as dean PERIOD

As a public university we owe it to the state and to our students to give them the best opportunities to better themselves Venkataraman said PERIOD

Petersen said sometimes professors can get set in their ways and are afraid to try something new PERIOD He encouraged the idea of faculty coming together and working on more interdisciplinary projects PERIOD

He compared this crossdisciplinary strategy to an orchestra PERIOD An orchestra is comprised of different sections including woodwind percussion brass and strings and each section has its own specialty similar to the colleges within UTA he said PERIOD

Individually the instruments sound beautiful but together they can produce something even more awe inspiring he said PERIOD

Theres an opportunity to create an orchestra he said PERIOD

Gregory Frazier operations management professor and associate dean for faculty and research said collaboration between colleges brings a variety of perspectives to the table PERIOD

People from different academic fields view things differently he said PERIOD So bringing the variety of perspectives together makes the research stronger. petersen said whoever is chosen for the College of Business dean needs a wide range of experience to handle the variety of tasks thrown their way PERIOD
